descriptionModule.briefSummary: The project aims to implement workstations for mobility training during intensive inpatient rehabilitation to increase the level of motor activity of individuals with hemiparesis due to stroke

armGroups.label: Intensive rehabilitation with workstations
interventionNames: Device: Conventional intensive functional rehabilitation + Workstations

interventions.name: Conventional intensive functional rehabilitation + Workstations
interventions.description: Equipment will be provided to participants where they can do exercises to increase their motor abilities at the lower limbs, trunk and upper limbs, in addition to conventional intensive functional rehabilitation

interventions.name: Conventional intensive functional rehabilitation
interventions.description: Includes rehabilitation interventions provided by professionnals (OT, PT, speech language therapy, neuropsychologists...)

primaryOutcomes.description: Measure of acceleration data of the paretic lower and upper-limbs by means of an accelerometer (actigraph (r)) placed at the ankle and wrist during seven consecutive days
primaryOutcomes.timeFrame: In the third or fourth week of rehabilitation
